dmca.title: Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
T 

 

________________________________

From: Winkus [mailto:winkus@tampabay.rr.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2007 6:07 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Violation

 

To Whom This May Concern,

 

I am the owner of the mark Dr. Michael Pinkus (R). 

 

It has come to my attention that a subscriber of yours is using my mark
unauthorized for the purpose of selling their weight loss products.  My
mark in on their web site and is listed in the meta names in the source
of their site.

 

The web sites are:
http://www.personalsland.com/weightloss/michael-pinkus.html

and

http://www.personalsland.com/weightloss/michael-r-pinkus.html

 

Here is the information from WHOIS:

 

http://www.whois.net/whois_new.cgi?d=+personalsland&tld=com

 

I am requesting that this site cease and desist from using my name
and/or trademarks. I also request that these sites are shut down
immediately.  

 

Thank you for your cooperation.  I look forward to your reply.

 

Sincerely,

 

Michael Pinkus
